profile.title: My Profile
profile.name: Alexandra Petrova
profile.about_text: Hello! My name is Alexandra, and I love meeting new people and discovering interesting stories. I'm a creative person who always seeks inspiration in the world around me. I love deep conversations, sincere emotions, and moments when you can be yourself without masks.
profile.personality_text: I'm open, friendly, and a bit dreamy. I love listening and supporting others, but I also know how to have fun and create a positive atmosphere. Sometimes I can be shy, but when I feel comfortable, I become very sociable and energetic.
profile.goals_text: I dream of visiting different countries, learning new cultures and languages. I want to develop my creative abilities and possibly write a book. The main goal is to find true love and create a strong family based on mutual understanding and support.
